text: hello everybody
welcome to our campground for the next
couple of days we're actually staying on
a vineyard called grassy Creek here in
the Yadkin Valley of North Carolina
conveniently parked right next to the
tasting room and right over here is
where the winemaker lives kind of cool
and if you don't have an RV but you want
to come here anyway that's okay these
are not really an RV campground
they have cabins for rent and they're
like $250 like for people different
sizes different things anyway it's kind
of cheap I thought and we have dinner
right over there tomorrow night with the
winemaker and the owners of the vineyard
you can see the grapes kind of in the
background so that's that I'll let you
know
